QuestData.Title: Into the Vale
QuestData.Description: Ah, I have been waiting for your arrival, traveler.$B$BI wish we could meet in better times, but alas, I fear the situation in the Vale is quite dire.$B$BBut let us not speak of that now. Go visit Matron Vi Vinh at the Shrine of Seven Stars.$B$BShe should be able to settle you in.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Matron Vi Vinh at the Shrine of Seven Stars in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms.
